reward_redemption_instructions_by_platfo.4: Redeem the code below on PUBG's in-game redemption page to claim the OG is Back Pack

reward_redemption_instructions_by_platfo.0: Redemption Code Content: Stellar Jade ×30, Credit ×20,000, Lost Gold Fragment ×4, Condensed Aether ×5, Traveler's Guide ×3. The Stellar Jade rewards are limited to 300,000 and will be available exclusively to the first 300,000 Trailblazers who successfully complete the Quest. To redeem your rewards, please visit the official website of Honkai: Star Rail through the [Redemption Page](https://hsr.hoyoverse.com/gift). Once there, log in to your account, select the correct server, enter the redemption code, and click the "Redeem" button. Once the redemption is successful, the rewards will be sent to you via in-game mail. Remember to log in to the game to claim them. The redemption code will expire on 2024/06/06 0:00:00 (UTC+8). We highly recommend redeeming it as soon as possible. The Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of Discord, as well as the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of HoYoverse Account, are applicable to this event. You should fully understand and abide by the aforementioned agreements before engaging in the event.

reward_redemption_instructions_by_platfo.0:
The V4.6 Bundle contains Mora ×20,000, Sanctifying Unction ×4, Mystic Enhancement Ore ×5, and Hero's Wit ×3. The first 300k to redeem will also receive Primogems x30.

To redeem, visit the official Genshin Impact website's [code redemption page](https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift), log in to your game account, then enter the redemption code as prompted. You'll receive the bundle via in-game mail. Redemption code expires 05/23/2024 0:00:00 (UTC+8). Genshin Impact's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply. See the [help center article](https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22908324765591) for full offer terms.

reward_redemption_instructions_by_platfo.0: This collectible can be redeemed on Discord! Go to your Gift Inventory to redeem and equip.

To redeem your THE FINALS gift code, log in to the [Embark Portal](https://id.embark.games/). Visit https://id.embark.games/ and log in via the platform where you play the game (Steam, PlayStation, or Xbox). Navigate to “Redeem Gift Code” and enter your code in the field provided. Press Redeem to receive your gift the next time you start the game. Please note: gift codes may expire. Unique codes can only be redeemed one time.
